Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job type: Full-time
Industry: Technology

Job Description


	We are looking for a passionate and skilled Software Developer to join our product engineering team.
	You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and enhancing our Loyalty &amp; Sales Enablement Platform&mdash;a next-generation engagement solution for B2B and B2C markets.
	This platform powers tiered loyalty programs, gamified campaigns, incentive management, and sales enablement tools used by our enterprise clients in FMCG, BFSI, retail, and other industries.
	You will collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and QA engineers to deliver high-quality, scalable, and secure features.


Key Responsibilities


	Feature Development &ndash; Build and enhance loyalty program modules, sales enablement tools, invoice upload &amp; approval workflows, and gamification features.
	API Development &amp; Integration &ndash; Design and implement RESTful APIs for mobile and web platforms; integrate with third-party services (payment gateways, telecom APIs, analytics tools).
	Database Management &ndash; Design and optimize relational and NoSQL databases for performance and scalability.
	UI/UX Implementation &ndash; Work closely with designers to implement responsive, mobile-first interfaces.
	Performance Optimization &ndash; Ensure the platform runs efficiently under high load, with minimal latency.
	Testing &amp; Quality Assurance &ndash; Write unit tests, support QA teams, and ensure code meets high-quality standards.
	Security &amp; Compliance &ndash; Implement secure coding practices, handle data privacy requirements (GDPR, local regulations).
	Collaboration &ndash; Participate in agile ceremonies, contribute to sprint planning, and document technical solutions.


Required Skills &amp; Qualifications
Technical Skills:


	Strong proficiency in JavaScript / TypeScript, Node.js or Java (Spring Boot)
	Experience with React.js, Next.js, or similar front-end frameworks
	Good understanding of REST API development and JSON
	Hands-on experience with MySQL / PostgreSQL and/or MongoDB
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure) o Knowledge of Git and version control best practices.


Additional Plus Skills (Good to Have):


	Experience with gamification mechanics in software applications o Integration with CRM, ERP, or payment systems
	Knowledge of mobile app development (Flutter / React Native)


Soft Skills:


	Strong problem-solving skills and analytical thinking
	Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment o Good communication and collaboration skills


Salary

Software Developer Job at Sproxil




        
    

        
        Sproxil is a global brand protection & consumer engagement solutions provider specialized in the provision of cutting edge advanced technology to combat counterfeiting, product theft and adulterations; as well as providing a platform for consumer engagement.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Software Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time
Industry: Technology

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a passionate and skilled Software Developer to join our product engineering team.
	You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and enhancing our Loyalty & Sales Enablement Platform—a next-generation engagement solution for B2B and B2C markets.
	This platform powers tiered loyalty programs, gamified campaigns, incentive management, and sales enablement tools used by our enterprise clients in FMCG, BFSI, retail, and other industries.
	You will collaborate with product managers, UI/UX designers, and QA engineers to deliver high-quality, scalable, and secure features.


Key Responsibilities


	Feature Development – Build and enhance loyalty program modules, sales enablement tools, invoice upload & approval workflows, and gamification features.
	API Development & Integration – Design and implement RESTful APIs for mobile and web platforms; integrate with third-party services (payment gateways, telecom APIs, analytics tools).
	Database Management – Design and optimize relational and NoSQL databases for performance and scalability.
	UI/UX Implementation – Work closely with designers to implement responsive, mobile-first interfaces.
	Performance Optimization – Ensure the platform runs efficiently under high load, with minimal latency.
	Testing & Quality Assurance – Write unit tests, support QA teams, and ensure code meets high-quality standards.
	Security & Compliance – Implement secure coding practices, handle data privacy requirements (GDPR, local regulations).
	Collaboration – Participate in agile ceremonies, contribute to sprint planning, and document technical solutions.


Required Skills & Qualifications
Technical Skills:


	Strong proficiency in JavaScript / TypeScript, Node.js or Java (Spring Boot)
	Experience with React.js, Next.js, or similar front-end frameworks
	Good understanding of REST API development and JSON
	Hands-on experience with MySQL / PostgreSQL and/or MongoDB
	Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure) o Knowledge of Git and version control best practices.


Additional Plus Skills (Good to Have):


	Experience with gamification mechanics in software applications o Integration with CRM, ERP, or payment systems
	Knowledge of mobile app development (Flutter / React Native)


Soft Skills:


	Strong problem-solving skills and analytical thinking
	Ability to work in a fast-paced, agile environment o Good communication and collaboration skills


Salary
N800,000 / month.

  "description": "TalentSquare -&nbsp;Our client is Nigeria&rsquo;s leading children&rsquo;s fashion brand, dedicated to innovation, excellence, and delivering premium-quality kids wear.

Job Position: Executive Personal Assistant (EPA)

Job Location: Lagos Mainland, Lagos&nbsp;
Job Type: Full-time

Job Description


	As we continue to scale, we are seeking an Executive Personal Assistant (EPA) to provide high-level administrative and personal support to our Founder &amp; Chief Responsibility Officer (CRO).
	This role requires a proactive individual with exceptional communication skills and the ability to manage a wide range of tasks, both professional and personal.
	The ideal candidate will be a trusted partner to the executive, anticipating their needs and ensuring smooth and efficient operations in all aspects of their work and personal life.


Job Summary


	The Executive &amp; Personal Assistant will serve as a strategic partner and right-hand to the Founder &amp; Chief Responsibility Officer (CRO). This role requires a highly organized, proactive, and resourceful professional who can seamlessly balance executive administrative support with personal assistance duties.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the CRO&rsquo;s daily schedule, coordinating business operations, handling confidential matters, and ensuring the smooth execution of both professional and personal commitments.
	This includes scheduling meetings, overseeing key projects, managing personal errands, handling household administration, and acting as a trusted liaison between the executive and stakeholders.
	This role requires exceptional discretion, problem-solving skills, and flexibility to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment. If you thrive in a high-level support role that blends corporate efficiency with personal assistance, this is the opportunity for you.


Key&nbsp;Responsibilities
Executive Support:


	Manage the Founder &amp; CRO&rsquo;s daily schedule, appointments, and meetings, ensuring optimal time management.
	Act as a bridge between the executive and internal/external stakeholders, handling correspondence and prioritizing key matters.
	Draft, review, and manage reports, presentations, and key documents.
	Oversee travel arrangements, including flight bookings, accommodation, and itineraries for business and personal travel.
	Assist with key projects, ensuring seamless coordination and follow-ups on critical action points.
	Provide confidential administrative support, handling sensitive business matters with discretion.


Personal Assistance &amp; Lifestyle Management:


	Manage household administration, personal shopping, and vendor coordination.
	Handle bill payments, personal expenses, and financial reconciliations.
	Run personal errands and ensure the smooth execution of both professional and personal engagements.
	Plan and oversee private events, social engagements, and personal obligations.
	Serve as a trusted right-hand person in ensuring the CRO&rsquo;s commitments (both professional and personal) are met efficiently.


Requirements


	Proven experience (4-6 years) as an Executive Assistant or Personal Assistant, preferably supporting C-level executives.
	Exceptional organizational, time management, and problem-solving skills.
	Strong ability to handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Google Suite, and scheduling tools.
	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Flexibility to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with non-traditional work hours and adaptability to changing priorities.
	A proactive mindset with the ability to anticipate needs and act accordingly.&nbsp;&nbsp;
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Strong decision-making abilities.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	A proactive and can-do attitude.


Salary
N500,000 - N700,000 / month.

Benefits:


	Financial Incentives:&nbsp;Competitive salaries, performance-based bonuses, referral bonuses for new customers and employees.
	Work-Life Balance &amp; Flexibility:&nbsp;Generous paid time off, paid parental leave, flexible work arrangements where possible.
	Professional Development &amp; Growth:&nbsp;Monthly workshops on the latest fashion trends, quarterly leadership development sessions, opportunities to attend industry conferences, clear career progression plans with defined promotion pathways.
	Health &amp; Wellness Benefits:&nbsp;Health insurance coverage, mental health support programs, employee wellness initiatives.
	Employee Engagement &amp; Culture:&nbsp;Fun workplace environment with seasonal team events and celebrations, annual company retreats or team-building outings, employee recognition programs with awards for outstanding contributions, opportunities to participate in community and charity events related to children&#39;s welfare.
	Exclusive Perks for Parents &amp; Kids:&nbsp;Priority access to limited edition products for employees, bring-your-child-to-work days, discounts on children&#39;s products.
